name: xdttransform
description: Apply XDT transforms on XML files
author: Guillaume Rouchon

inputs.name: sourceFile
inputs.label: Source file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the XML file on which to apply the XDT transforms.

inputs.name: transformFile
inputs.label: Transform file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the XDT transform file.

inputs.name: outputFile
inputs.label: Output file
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Path to the output file, can be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory.
Leave empty to overwrite the source file.
